nodes.text: Ezzar's spies were a network of spies who operated in the Darkside district of the planet Coruscant during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The spies served the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar, who chose not to reveal his true identity to his minions and represented himself to them as a Jedi thug, causing the spies to refer to him as "the Jedi in black."
